name: Frank Palmer
coverLetter: Had my first Medical Marijuana prescription in Oregon 2003. 126 person to receive prescription in Oregon. I grew for five years under Oregon medical laws. I'm in my mid fifties, and need some cannabis storage, and cash work... I need space to camp, and I have a touring bike with all my gear. I plan to tour the south later this winter... I have Oregon Identification. Birth certificate..
contact: E-mail is best for me. Frankvictor333@gmail.com
